InformativeText.Abstract: This service exposes a device’s current transmit power level when in a connection.
InformativeText.Summary:
The Tx Power service is instantiated as a Primary Service.
    There is only one instance of the Tx Power service on a device.
    There is exactly one instance of the Tx Power Level characteristic

Dependencies.Dependency: This service has no dependencies on other GATT-based services.

Service.ErrorCodes: Replace table by: This service does not define any application error codes that are used in Attribute Protocol.

Characteristic.InformativeText: The Tx Power Level characteristic represents the current transmit power level of a physical layer for which the characteristic is associated.
